criterion: Provides an incorrect or incomplete list of signs and symptoms of Lyme disease
Asks the user to clarify the region where they were bitten
Provides a detailed flow diagram for early detection and management of Lyme disease
Mentions the importance of seeking medical attention if symptoms persist or worsen
Uses technical medical jargon or overly complicated language
Fails to mention the importance of tick removal and proper wound care
Provides a clear and concise explanation of Lyme disease transmission and prevention
Does not mention the possibility of co-infection with other tick-borne diseases
